title: Province 5 COVID-19 Tracker
description:
Join thousands of people supporting health personnel of Province-5 help fight Novel Coronavirus by identifying:

* How fast the virus is spreading in your area
* High-risk areas in the Province-5
* Who is most at risk, by better understanding symptoms linked to underlying health conditions

You will contribute to advance research on COVID-19 in partnership with leading health researchers nationally.

This app allows you to help others, but does not give health advice. If you need health advice please call the nearby hospital. 

If you would like to help out in this difficult time, then you can. Download the app and share daily your own status, even if you are well. With your help we can understand much better the situation across the nation, how the disease presents itself to different people, and how it progresses.

This is a new virus which the world has never seen before. There are a wide range of symptoms, which differ between people. With your help we can understand better how the disease presents itself depending upon individual factors such as health and age.

No information you share will be used for commercial purposes.

There are four parts to the app:

HEALTH INFORMATION
You will be asked to share some general information, such as your age and some health details, such as whether you have certain diseases.

SYMPTOM TRACKING
We will ask you every day to let us know how you feel, so you can share your symptoms. We will also ask whether you have visited the hospital, what treatment you received there, and whether you have been tested for COVID-19 (Coronavirus)

HOSPITAL INFORMATION
Nearby hospital information like contact number and quarantine bed capacity will be shown in the app. 

LATEST NEWS INFORMATION
Latest news from kha.bar instant news article about COVID-19 will be displayed in the application.

summary: Help slow the spread of COVID-19 by reporting symptoms if anyone feels unwell.
summaryHTML: Help slow the spread of COVID-19 by reporting symptoms if anyone feels unwell.
recentChanges:
Auto sign-in after signup.
Image issues fixed.
Layout enhancements. 
Minor bug fixes.

comments: It has not all information of Corona virus update. It's show all Nepal information. But which district how many affected by Corona virus we can't check. Like this information we can check in Google, no need to install app.
Very useful app to get information and help government to manage the current pandemic situation.
Runs well. No problem so far! Great app to stay updated and report about the incidents.
A useful and must have app for province 5 people in these times of corona virus.
Please sir not allow prades no 6 apps good job sir
Aajkal kunai pani new update aako nai chhain
